LanguageData.BloodTransfusion.label: blood transfusion
LanguageData.BloodTransfusion.description: Use hemogen packs to reduce the effects of blood loss. Each hemogen pack used recovers 35% blood loss. The operation will also restore hemogen to hemogenic individuals.
LanguageData.ExtractHemogenPack.label: extract hemogen pack
LanguageData.ExtractHemogenPack.description: Extract a hemogen pack from the target. The operation will fail to produce a hemogen pack if the target does not have enough blood.\n\nHemogen packs can be administered to others to reduce blood loss or to satiate those who feed on blood.
LanguageData.ExtractOvum.label: extract ovum for IVF
LanguageData.ExtractOvum.description: Extract an ovum into a storage capsule. It can then be fertilized by a man, and finally implanted into a mother to start a pregnancy.
LanguageData.ImplantEmbryo.label: implant embryo
LanguageData.ImplantEmbryo.description: Implant an embryo in a surrogate mother to begin a pregnancy.
LanguageData.ImplantIUD.label: implant IUD
LanguageData.ImplantIUD.description: Implant a small metal device in the uterus to prevent pregnancies. It can later be removed, but there is a small chance of leaving the patient permanently sterile. This surgery terminates pregnancies in the first trimester.
LanguageData.ImplantIUD.successfullyRemovedHediffMess: {0} has successfully implanted an IUD in {1}.
LanguageData.ImplantXenogerm.label: implant xenogerm
LanguageData.ImplantXenogerm.description: Implant a xenogerm into a patient. This replaces any previous xenogerm they may have had.
LanguageData.RemoveIUD.label: remove IUD
LanguageData.RemoveIUD.description: Remove an implanted intrauterine device to allow normal pregnancy. If the surgery goes wrong, the patient will be rendered permanently sterile.
LanguageData.ReverseVasectomy.label: reverse vasectomy
LanguageData.ReverseVasectomy.description: Attempt to reverse the vasectomy and make a man capable of fathering children again. Most vasectomy reversals succeed, but if the surgery goes wrong the man will be left permanently sterile.
LanguageData.ReverseVasectomy.jobString: performing a vasectomy reversal on TargetA.
LanguageData.ReverseVasectomy.successfullyRemovedHedi: {0} has successfully performed a vasectomy reversal on {1}.
LanguageData.TerminatePregnancy.label: terminate pregnancy
LanguageData.TerminatePregnancy.description: Terminate the pregnancy of an animal or human.
LanguageData.TubalLigation.label: perform tubal ligation
LanguageData.TubalLigation.description: Permanently render a patient sterile and unable to reproduce.
LanguageData.TubalLigation.successfullyRemovedHediffM: {0} has successfully performed tubal ligation on {1}.
LanguageData.Vasectomy.label: perform vasectomy
LanguageData.Vasectomy.description: Cut the vas deferens to render the patient unable to reproduce. If the surgery goes wrong the patient will be left permanently sterile.
LanguageData.Vasectomy.successfullyRemovedHediffMessa: {0} has successfully performed a vasectomy on {1}.
